comment._content: from the NY Times: LIEUT. COMMANDER LAY H. EVERHART, U.S.N., commanding officer of the New York Board of Education's training ship, Newport, has evolved a plan for the creation of a National merchant marine school where can be trained American boys who in the future could be called on to command American merchant vessels, naval auxiliaries, and transports used in sending American troops and supplies to our island possessions. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F04E5D81430E233A...
